verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4043>Walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3860>gave<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> up <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2248>us,<s%> an <S%G4376>offering<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G2175>sweet-smelling<s%> <S%G3744>fragrance.<s%>

<S%G1097>Know<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2075>sure,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> sexually <S%G4205>immoral<s%> <S%G2228>person,<s%> nor unclean <S%G169>person,<s%> <S%G2228>nor<s%> covetous <S%G4123>man,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> an <S%G1496>idolater,<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3756>any<s%> <S%G2817>inheritance<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G932>Kingdom<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G538>Let<s%> no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G538>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G2756>empty<s%> <S%G3056>words.<s%> For because <S%G1063>of<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the things <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1096>done<s%> by <S%G846>them<s%> in <S%G2931>secret,<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G150>shame<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> to <S%G3004>speak<s%> <S%G5259>of.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G3588>when<s%> they are <S%G1651>reproved,<s%> are <S%G5319>revealed<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> the <S%G5457>light,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> that <S%G5319>reveals<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5457>light.<s%>

<S%G2980>speaking<s%> to one <S%G1438>another<s%> in <S%G5568>psalms,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5215>hymns,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> <S%G5603>songs;<s%> <S%G103>singing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> making <S%G5567>melody<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>

giving <S%G2168>thanks<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G5228>concerning<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G3962>Father;<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> Christ <S%G5613>also<s%> <S%G5547>is<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> <S%G2532>being<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2076>the<s%> <S%G4990>savior<s%> of the <S%G4983>body.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G5618>as<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> is subject <S%G5293>to<s%> <S%G2532>Christ,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> let the <S%G1135>wives<s%> also be to their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>everything.<s%>
<S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G37>sanctify<s%> <S%G2511>it,<s%> having cleansed it by the <S%G3067>washing<s%> of <S%G5204>water<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G4487>word,<s%>

<S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G3936>present<s%> <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G1577>assembly<s%> to <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G1741>gloriously,<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G4696>spot<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4512>wrinkle<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> such <S%G5108>thing;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> without <S%G299>blemish.<s%>

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G435>husbands<s%> also <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> own <S%G1135>wives<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4983>bodies.<s%> He <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G1438>himself.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G4218>ever<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4561>flesh;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1625>nourishes<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2282>cherishes<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> also does the <S%G1577>assembly;<s%>

<S%G473>"For<s%> this <S%G5127>cause<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> will <S%G2641>leave<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> will be <S%G4347>joined<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%> The <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2071>will<s%> <S%G1519>become<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>"

<S%G4133>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> of <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G25>must<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3779><s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G1135>wife<s%> even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>himself;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> let the <S%G1135>wife<s%> see <S%G2443>that<s%> she <S%G5399>respects<s%> her <S%G435>husband.<s%>
